description:
Rentaro has come up with a convoluted plan to get Karane`s tsundere back. Will it work out?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daishuki na 100-nin no Kanojo (Ato 89-nin)
The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You (89 to Go)
君のことが大大大大大しゅきな100人の彼女 (あと89人)
